12187bf8-5b11-54d5-b122-7752d6da52d2.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Precast reinforced concrete pipes shall be accepted on the basis of full compliance with the requirements of this section and AS/NZS 4058.

f23cf24c-dfda-553c-9d7f-e4d48b61cd8c.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed Receival and Inspection Checklist

77724872-9f9e-5680-bc8a-41cdc56a6396.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: Receival & Inspection Checklist Manufacturer cetificate or accreditation

f10f726b-96e6-5fb6-b3fc-da96fb987048.title: REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: VicRoads Spec. Cl.619 Cl. 701.04 Cl. 701.05(a) AS4058 AS4680

2d9f5af0-33de-5f3e-b390-ae0de594d157.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Precast Reinforced Concrete Box Culverts to comply with requirements of VicRoads Section 619. Precast Reinforced Concrete (Portland) Pipes shall comply with requirements of AS 4058

f83c6a47-a6ae-5383-8800-7051d98f332d.title: REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: VicRoads Spec. Cl.610 Cl. 705.04 AS5100

4d662bc9-6858-5d45-b6cf-0fe695b1e960.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: Receival & Inspection Checklist Manufacturer cetificate or accreditation

ae84ae60-665d-5f9e-8eb9-b994a46840ba.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All concrete shall be manufactured to the concrete mix design registered by VicRoads and comply with the requirements of Section 610.

3d64a215-0bcd-56df-97ef-af13aa91de53.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Materials used for bedding and selected backfill shall be free from perishable matter and lumps and shall conform with the requirements of Table 701.091 and Table 701.092.

6c237176-b65a-5b9c-8dd4-ef1f5656820c.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: Test Reports from supplier

1f8b6f9a-f637-5bd5-8d7e-d9899a4c2993.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: Test Reports from supplier

326bca47-fe4c-5a50-aebb-9b2122d32d1a.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ordinary backfill shall be free from perishable matter and shall conform with the requirements of Table 701.091.

2c57a32c-25b6-5b5b-889a-f44b2127a5cb.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: Test Reports from supplier

3440972d-ef3c-5881-bd47-9b2438772822.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Cementituous grouts shall be minimum Type C class dual shinkage compensating, with a minimum 28 day compressive strength of 40 Mpa

160067e8-ae92-5308-b3dc-639afc5db816.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: An excavation permit must be issued prior to any excavation commencing. Plant and equipment shall be appropriate for the task. Excavation operations shall not disturb areas outside the limit of excavation

0236c2d7-4aaa-539c-a512-04519e07be9c.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The position of all drainage lines are to be confirmed with the superintendent

4fe0d7c7-153a-556e-89a0-eba729783297.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Horizontal clearance ( between the walls of trench to the side of pipe shall be 150mm minimum. Trench walls to be vertical where practical.

5a7a2bba-8ae9-5ef9-94c7-5f797c9a379b.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: A minimum clearance of 400mm is required around the external faces of precast pits.

c8fc8c20-8872-5d8f-8155-9f32189f0a9e.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Compacted to refusal using mechanical plant.

f26e68ef-b681-5ce8-898c-05a06d1bb446.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Bedding and backfill materials shall be placed and compacted in layers not exceeding 150 mm loose thickness. Bedding shall be compacted to refusal using hand held mechanical equipment. Bedding material which has a swell equal to or greater than 2.5% shall be maintained at a mean moisture ratio of 92% between the completion of rolling and the placement of the overlying layer.

eabde251-9bc3-56ef-adca-fc4dc05499b4.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Pipes & pits placed as shown on the drawings. No laying to occur until bedding lines and levels and compaction requirements have been satisfied

4f3daf60-1944-5b22-aabb-c09e0ad09850.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All interlocking (flush) joint reinforced concrete pipes shall be mortar jointed, or wrapped with a 200 mm wide external joint rubber band.

d137a1be-1281-5bf1-8bac-f2ac0fb4cb93.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Contact areas between top and bottom sections of box culverts to be mortared. The joints between various components such as drainage pits, access chambers and pipes shall be made watertight using a cementitious mortar in accordance with the requirements of Clause 610.32.

meta.name: 2.9 Sealing - for joining culvert sections and pipe penetrations in pits

2c2d461b-cb02-5a58-be5d-fa16fca1ec7d.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The location of each run of drainage has been verified prior to backfilling and conforms to the following tolerances: (a) offset of entry pits required to match lines of kerbs or barriers ±20 mm (b) plan location of pits other than offsets to kerb lines or barriers ±100 mm (c) invert level of pipes at pits ±50 mm (d) departure from design grade of pipe runs ±10 mm in 10 m provided minimum grade is not less than 1:250

meta.name: 2.10 Survey of laid pipe or pit

593c4f35-dcc1-507c-b550-41622c3af5ae.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Height of additional bedding material = 30% of nominal pipe diameter or culvert height. Loose layer thickness <=150mm Compacted to refusal using hand held mechanical equipment. 1 lot = 150mm layer

ab100fc3-c27d-5ce7-97eb-fd78bcaca8ee.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Backfill under paved area: fill trench with selected back fill material to subgrade level Backfill under area not paved: Back fill trench with selected back fill to a level 0.3 m above the top of pipe or culvert, and ordinary back fill above that level Loose layer thickness <= 150mm. 1 lot = 150mm layer

meta.name: 2.12 Place & compact backfill material over pipes

452edb54-ab14-5586-a91d-c0c6991d14f1.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Loose layer thickness <= 300mm. Compacted to refusal using hand held mechanical equipment.

meta.name: 2.13 Place & compact backfill material around pits

bf39f04f-dc42-53e1-a33e-95db14eaa03c.title: RECORD OF CONFORMITY: Superintendent approval ITP signed

81d426df-9a35-540f-b720-c189cfc8c5a7.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Where approval is given from superintendent, culverts in trenches may be backfilled to half the pipe diameter or box culvert height with 3% stabilised sand with a water content sufficient to ensure penetration beneath the pipe or box culvert invert without leaving free surface water.

13575a6d-3843-5890-a25b-4f7d0b6d857b.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As shown on Standard VicRoads drawing - Pit & Pipe Invert levels SD 1002

f6530d9e-ab1c-51b1-9b9a-4c23e31c3bbb.title: REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Standard VicRoads drawing SD 1002

meta.name: 2.16 Pit base shaped with concrete to match pipe invert

899f2c28-9688-50ee-a095-c91c2ea12806.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Covers must be set to within ±10mm of the design levels shown on the drawings

5d5679d9-248d-5633-b953-1231d8570dd0.title: FREQUENCY: Each damaged pipe or culvert

36afb3f8-ddfc-52f7-9361-8f2f4a1e0880.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: No repairs shall be undertaken without the superintendents approval of the repair materials and procedures All repair procedures undertaken in accordance with Cl 701.25

meta.name: 2.18 Repairs to damaged pipes and box culverts

e1ad2889-36c4-5a11-ac34-0e368df35de2.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Backfill material shall be compactied to a mean density ratio of 97% using standard compactive effort. Bedding shall be compacted to refusal using hand held mechanical equipment. Bedding material which has a swell equal to or greater than 2.5% shall be maintained at a mean moisture ratio of 92% between the completion of rolling and the placement of the overlying layer.

16c373b2-d9d0-5822-95bb-6cb7444abf32.title: FREQUENCY: at least 20% of all lots

meta.name: 3.1 Compaction and moisture content of backfill & bedding material

5e636c7f-fb3d-534b-a8a7-58282e2a044d.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All drainage lines constructed shall be inspected, after completion of earthworks to subgrade level and prior to construction of pavement layers, by an independent testing organisation using closed circuit television (CCTV) to verify that the flow of water is not obstructed by waste construction material left inside and to check for visible signs of defects.

af6cf473-d8a9-5173-bcb0-3a94be6c98ea.title: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All pipes to be flushed clean upon completion
